DOC.brief_summary: Randomized trial demonstrate excellent safety efficacy profile chromium everolimus-eluting stent . The platinum chromium everolimus-eluting sten ( PtCr-EES ) use identical antiproliferative agent polymer novel platinum chromium scaffold design enhanced deliverability , vessel conformability , side-branch access , radiopacity , radial strength , fracture resistance . However , efficacy PtCr-EES complex coronary artery diseases subset chronic total occlusion , bifurcation lesion , leave main trunk disease , small vessel disease still unknown .
DOC.brief_title: Study Examining PROMUS Element Everolimus-eluting Stent Multi-center Coronary Intervention Complex Arterial Lesion Subsets
DOC.criteria: 1 . A patient ischemic heart disease include stable angina pectoris acute coronary syndrome 2 . Male nonpregnant female 3 . Key lesion inclusion criterion follow 1 . Multivessel diseases 2 . Long lesion ( lesion length > 30mm visual estimation ) 3 . Small vessel disease ( reference diameter < 2.5mm visual estimation ) 4 . Bifurcation lesion 5 . Ostial lesion 6 . Calcified lesion 7 . Protected nonprotected leave main trunk disease 8 . Chronic total occlusion 9 . In stent restenosis bare metal stent everolimuseluting stent 1 . Hypersensitivity cobalt chromium , everolimus , heparin , aspirin , ticlopidine , clopidogrel Xray contrast medium . 2 . Serum creatinine level > 3.0 mg/dL 3 . Other concomitant disease medical condition could impact patient/procedural outcome , history bleed diathesis cancer within 5 year .
